籤詩版本二:
UMentingji wonwabile kakhulu, kwaye umnyango wezenzo ezilungileyo uyachuma.
Zonke izinto zihamba kakuhle kwintsimi yomtshato, kwaye xa isifo sidibana neyeza elimangalisayo, uya kuba ngcono
詩意:
Le hexagram imele iphupha lasentwasahlobo elinamakhulu eentyatyambo.
Yonke into ilungile xa udibana nomntu ohloniphekileyo.

(Le hexagram luphawu lombhiyozo olungileyo.
Yonke into ihamba kakuhle.
)
解曰: Intwasahlobo inzulu kwaye nelanga lishushu. Iintyatyambo ziyadubula zodwa. Musa ukuthandabuza. Kuvela ebantwini.
籤詩故事一:
◇Umhla wokuzalwa kukaGuo ​​Fenyang
UGuo Ziyi, injengele enkulu yeTang Dynasty kunye noKumkani waseFenyang, wenze itheko lokuzalwa. Izalamane nabahlobo beza kuvuyisana nabo, yaye umoya wawuzaliswe luvuyo novuyo.
聖意: Umzi wosapho uyaphumelela, ukuzimela ukhuselekile, ubutyebi buyaphumelela, ishishini liyaphumelela, umtshato uyaphumelela, Liujia inqanda izinto ezimangalisayo, abahambi ngeenyawo baya emasimini, imibungu yesilika iyaphumelela, imfuyo iyaphumelela, abantu bayafunyanwa, ukumangalelwa. iphumelele, ukufuduka kuphumelele, izinto ezilahlekileyo zifunwa ngokukhawuleza, izifo ziAnshan, ingcwaba lithamsanqa
